Colombia's ELN rebels say have freed all hostages under deal with gov'tColombia's National Liberation Army (ELN) rebels said on Friday they have freed all hostages under a deal made with the country's government to end kidnapping for ransom. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 21:31:58 GMT WWNBIBWFLFIP3JH4IMG7ZW36OE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/colombias-eln-rebels-say-they-have-freed-all-hostages-under-deal-with-govt-2024-03-01/Reuters世界美洲
Global media outlets sign letter urging protection of journalists in GazaSenior leaders at multiple global media outlets signed a letter urging Israeli authorities to protect journalists in Gaza, saying reporters have been working in unprecedented conditions during Israel's assault on the enclave and faced "grave personal risk." Fri, 01 Mar 2024 21:06:27 GMT阿XUAERSWRN6FIBYFOE7S7R4RY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/global-media-outlets-sign-letter-urging-protection-of-journalists-in-gaza-2024-03-01/Kanishka Singh世界中东地区
Haitian gang leader vows to 'fight' prime minister, violence surgesHaitian gang leader Jimmy Cherizier, also known as Barbecue, warned on Friday he will keep trying to oust Prime Minister Ariel Henry, and asked families to keep children from going to school to "avoid collateral damages," as violence surges in parts of the capital. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 20:07:11 GMT EFEZR24N5BMCZK4XOHL5V3GL4E https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/us-embassy-haiti-issues-alert-amid-heavy-gunfire-traffic-disruptions-2024-03-01/Reuters世界美洲
Biden says US military will drop aid into GazaPresident Joe Biden said on Friday the U.S. military would drop humanitarian aid into the Gaza Strip in the coming days, and that Washington would be doing everything it could to get more aid into the enclave. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 19:34:46 GMT NT4LKAJEUNI3LOAHPDKDRSUFTQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/biden-says-us-military-will-drop-aid-into-gaza-2024-03-01/Reuters世界中东地区
Injured survivors of Gaza aid chaos say Israeli forces shot at themSome Palestinians injured in a Gaza aid delivery disaster said on Friday that Israeli forces shot them as they rushed to get food for their families, describing a scene of terror and chaos. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 19:28:33 GMT KFO5EYBCJZI4VEWZBK3WSGF2JY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/injured-survivors-gaza-aid-chaos-say-israeli-forces-shot-them-2024-03-01/Reuters世界中东地区
Next G20 finance meetings may lack joint statement, but Brazil aims for consensus, official saysBrazil's presidency of the G20 believes upcoming meetings of the finance leaders of the world's major economies may conclude without a joint statement amid a lack of consensus on how to address geopolitical issues, said a senior official on Friday. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 19:26:28 GMT G3IFFV55ARO2JGAIQCZ3KGG7MQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/next-g20-finance-meetings-may-lack-joint-statement-brazil-aims-consensus-2024-03-01/Marcela Ayres, Bernardo Caram世界美洲
Nicaragua files case at World Court against Germany for aiding IsraelNicaragua has filed a case at the International Court of Justice against Germany for giving financial and military aid to Israel and for defunding the U.N. Palestinian refugee agency (UNRWA), the U.N.'s top court said on Friday. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 19:17:48 GMT OMPQ6RCC7VP4TOMXMKNSN4C5TQ https://www.reuters.com/world/nicaragua-files-case-world-court-against-germany-aiding-israel-2024-03-01/Stephanie Van Den Berg世界
Biden says US military to airdrop food and supplies into GazaU.S. President Joe Biden announced on Friday plans to carry out a first military airdrop of food and supplies into Gaza, a day after the deaths of Palestinians queuing for aid threw a spotlight on an unfolding humanitarian catastrophe in the crowded coastal enclave. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 19:00:39 GMT M26LVNONNBOOMHPKI3SP5CPIVUE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/biden-announces-us-air-drop-aid-into-gaza-us-officials-say-2024-03-01/Phil Stewart, Idrees Ali, Nandita Bose世界中东地区
US awards outspoken Cuban dissident with 'Woman of Courage' honorThe United States on Friday honored a Cuban dissident who for decades has defied the communist-run government with her on-island advocacy of human rights, a move likely to irritate Havana. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 18:57:28 GMT TEWAN5KWNVLGPPWK4MJHDXGLPU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/us-awards-outspoken-cuban-dissident-with-woman-courage-honor-2024-03-01/Reuters世界美洲
Ecuador asks to enter Mexico embassy, arrest former Ecuador VPEcuador has requested Mexico's permission to enter that country's embassy in Quito and arrest former Ecuadorean Vice-President Jorge Glas, the Ecuadorean Foreign Ministry said on Friday. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 18:55:08 GMT 2DZZLLQCWFJOZFSP53EJB6BNIQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/ecuador-asks-enter-mexico-embassy-arrest-former-ecuador-vp-2024-03-01/Alexandra Valencia, Raul Cortes世界美洲
Moldovan regional leader in Moscow as president fears destabilisationThe pro-Kremlin head of Moldova's Gagauzia region asked Russia on Friday for its support and to maintain close ties, after the pro-European Moldovan president said Moscow was mounting new efforts to destabilise her country. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 18:51:41 GMT P5SHF2NC3VP73P2J7WLHIP5FC4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/moldova-regional-leader-moscow-president-fears-destabilization-2024-03-01/Alexander Tanas世界欧洲
